channel.title: [URGENT]Running My Server On VPS[URGENT]
channel.description:
I have downloaded Utorrent, No-ip, My files, Java, JDK and all of the stuff that I need.
But how do I actually get it to work so that when I change the client IP and run the server, people from anywhere can connect?
Also what do I set the IP as? My VPS IP or my No-IP IP?
Add my MSM please if you can help! It is very URGENT as I have 60+ people on my forums waiting for me to get the server online!
[email]FrostyScape@hotmail.com[/email]
PLEASE ADD AND HELP IF YOU CAN
Thanks

item.title: [URGENT]Running My Server On VPS[URGENT]
item.dc:creator: @frostyboy07 frostyboy07
item.description:
@frostyboy07 wrote:

[quote=“Liquid Magic, post:9, topic:369439”][quote author=frostyboy07 link=topic=465568.msg3404769#msg3404769 date=1290232597]
My runserver.bat still says ‘Server is already in use’.

Does that matter?

And it still won’t work I just tried it.
[/quote]

Close uTorrent, and anything else using the port 43594. If your other computer has no-ip on it, take it off, or end the process. Make sure any other computer isn’t already hosting a server on that connection on the port 43594. To debug, try changing your port to 2834096782094768320947682903746890273462 1234 and see if that works.[/quote]

I have the no-ip duc on my laptop, but my laptop is rarely even on. So do I still delete the no-ip from mt laptop?

Also it wouldn’t connect can someone please add my MSN: FrostyScape@hotmail.com
And TeamViewer it later please?

Read full topic

item.title: [URGENT]Running My Server On VPS[URGENT]
item.dc:creator: @Liquid_Magic Liquid Magic
item.description:
@Liquid_Magic wrote:

[quote=“frostyboy07, post:8, topic:369439”]My runserver.bat still says ‘Server is already in use’.

Does that matter?

And it still won’t work I just tried it.[/quote]

Close uTorrent, and anything else using the port 43594. If your other computer has no-ip on it, take it off, or end the process. Make sure any other computer isn’t already hosting a server on that connection on the port 43594. To debug, try changing your port to 2834096782094768320947682903746890273462 1234 and see if that works.

Read full topic

item.title: [URGENT]Running My Server On VPS[URGENT]
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

[quote=“frostyboy07, post:4, topic:369439”][quote author=TheCyberMan link=topic=465568.msg3404666#msg3404666 date=1290226443]
Set the port on utorrent to 43594 and quit. Then run the server with no-ip open and you’re set.
[/quote]

Ok, so do I set the IP to my VPS IP or myserver.no-ip.biz ?

EDIT: Mt runserver.bat for my source, says ‘Server is already in use’.[/quote]

You use the No-ip address because it is made to basically rename your IP of your VPS so that its harder for people to find it out.

Read full topic

item.title: [URGENT]Running My Server On VPS[URGENT]
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

use your no ip, download the no-ip duc, log in with the account your no -ip is on, make sure everything is enabled, etc.
btw, vps dont need portforwarding, its automatic portforwarded.

Read full topic
